data.title: Latest National News, Videos & Photos - ABC News - ABC News
data.meta_description: Get the  latest breaking news across the U.S. on ABCNews.com
data.text:
United Airlines flight attendants vote to authorize strike: Will it impact travel?

99.99% of flight attendants voted in favor of strike authorization.

Vice President Kamala Harris and Donald Trump focus on swing states

There are just over two months until voters will elect the next president. The chief competitors for the post, Harris and Trump, are now campaigning in states that are believed to be up for grabs.

Couple in Lamborghini kidnapped and beaten while house hunting, police say

Six men from Florida were arrested after their getaway van crashed.

Summer scorcher: Dangerous heat hits Northeast

The extreme temperatures will end in the Northeast on Thursday.

Police capture 'aggressive' water buffalo that had been on the loose for days

The animal was transported to a veterinary hospital, Pleasant Hill police said.

Politician sentenced to life in prison for killing journalist

Robert Telles was accused of fatally stabbing reporter Jeff German in 2022.

Ohio residents speak out after increase in fracking wells

There are 1,625 fracking wells in Belmont County this year, which is a 25% increase from 2023, according to the Ohio Department of Natural Resources.

Former cop accused of killing pregnant woman, staging death to look like suicide

Matthew Farwell allegedly strangled Sandra Birchmore in 2021, the DOJ said.

SCOTUS declines to reinstate Biden administration student debt cancellation plan

The U.S. Supreme Court declined to reinstate the Biden administration’s latest plan to cancel student debt, with millions of borrowers now in limbo while lawsuits work their way through the courts.

Couple, dog missing from nudist community: Police

Stephanie Menard and Daniel Menard were reported missing on Sunday.

Former cop accused of killing pregnant woman

Matthew Farwell allegedly strangled Sandra Birchmore in 2021, the DOJ said.

Parents of car crash victim push for teen driver's mom to be held accountable

Flynn Mackrell, 18, was killed when a 16-year-old friend crashed while speeding.

Unpacking Mark Zuckerberg's letter to Congress about Biden and Facebook

Peter Kafka, who covers media and technology as chief correspondent for Business Insider joined Brad Mielke on Wednesday's episode of "Start Here," ABC News’ flagship daily news podcast.

Worker stranded by colleagues on Colorado mountain is rescued

The incident happened on Mount Shavano in Colorado’s San Isabel National Forest.

Polaris Dawn mission launch further delayed due to 'unfavorable weather': SpaceX

The mission was previously delayed over a ground-side helium leak.

Elderly couple goes missing from nudist ranch

Authorities are searching for a California couple and their dog who have been missing since Saturday.

Sarah Palin granted new trial in defamation lawsuit against New York Times

The federal appeals court found issues "impugn the reliability" of the verdict.

FBI gives latest update on Trump assassination attempt

The FBI said it has conducted nearly 1,000 interviews.

Missouri Supreme Court blocks agreement that would have halted execution

Marcellus Williams would have been sentenced to life in prison without parole, but now his Sept. 24 execution date is still on pending a hearing.

Former Tom Girardi's legal consultant reacts to guilty verdict

Kimberly Archie was instrumental in shining a light on the decades of fraud committed by Tom Girardi's firm.

80-year-old dies falling off boat on rapids trip in Grand Canyon

This is the 13th death in the park this year.

Rescued: Man allegedly stranded on mountain by co-workers during office retreat

The incident happened on Mt. Shavano in Colorado’s San Isabel National Forest.

Former lawyer Tom Girardi found guilty of wire fraud

Tom Girardi's former legal consultant, Kimbely Archie, joins to speak about the verdict, and what that means for the many victims who lost money due to Girardi’s yearslong Ponzi scheme.

Who was Emmett Till?

The 14-year-old black teenager's killing in Mississippi helped inspire the civil rights movement.

Department of Justice files new charges against Trump

DOJ Special Counsel Jack Smith brought the same previous indictments but removed any language that mentions any behavior that could be considered official acts by then-President Donald Trump.

Doorbell cam captures cyclist crashing into falling tree

A doorbell cam captured the dramatic moment a tree came crashing down and nearly struck a cyclist as thunderstorms hit Milwaukee, Wisconsin, this week.

US intelligence agencies on high alert after European terror attacks

ISIS claimed responsibility for the stabbing that killed three at a festival in Germany. American police are concerned about similar attacks in the U.S., inspired by terror killings in Europe.

National headlines from ABC News

Catch up on the developing stories making headlines.

Nearly 2-mile high mountain with 20 new species found in international waters

Scientists expect even more new species to emerge from the region.

Labor Day traffic and travel: Best and worst times to drive and fly

The TSA anticipates Aug. 30 will be its peak travel day of Labor Day weekend.

A university professor will fly into space for a first-of-its-kind experiment

Researchers are trying to understand how cells transition from earth to space.

Dog breeder found dead and as many as 10 of his Doberman puppies have vanished

Police emphasized that locating the puppies may also help solve his homicide.

Couple in Lamborghini kidnapped and beaten while house hunting, police say

Six men from Florida were arrested after their getaway van crashed

Murder suspect on the run for months falls through ceiling during home search

He was wanted for murder for the April 2 shooting of Troy Cunningham.

ABC News Live Rundown: Tuesday, August 27, 2024

Stay up to date on the developing stories making headlines.

Iowa police warn residents to steer clear of 'aggressive' water buffalo on the loose

Police in Pleasant Hill, Iowa, warned residents to steer clear of an "aggressive" water buffalo on the loose in the community.

Latino voting group calls for DOJ probe of election fraud raids in Texas

The raids were part an ongoing election fraud probe led by Texas AG Ken Paxton.

2 workers killed, 1 hurt in 'possible explosion' at Delta maintenance facility

The incident took place at Delta Tech Ops' wheel and brake shop.

2 injured in fiery, head-on collision involving vehicle, school bus: Police

The cause of the crash is still under investigation, police said.

15-year-old charged after bomb threats made against his high school

The teen allegedly worked with a 12-year-old he met online to make the threats.

Man hit with arson charges in California blaze that destroyed 26 homes and businesses

The suspect is accused of tossing fireworks out his car window, officials said.

European terror attacks alarm US intelligence: NYPD

The attacks in Germany and France have alarmed U.S. law enforcement.

Dangerous heat to head to Northeast after slamming Midwest

D.C. may hit a new record-high temperature on Wednesday.

Timeline: Special counsel's probe into Trump's efforts to overturn 2020 election

Special counsel Jack Smith was tapped in late 2022 to oversee the investigation.

2 teens, newborn baby reported missing from Los Angeles area: Police

The newborn girl suffers from a heart condition and needs daily medication.
